info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 20 at 5:22PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Kane County through 600 PM CDT... At 521 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hampshire, or 8 miles northwest of Campton Hills, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Elgin, Bartlett, St. Charles, West Chicago, Batavia, Huntley, Geneva, Campton Hills, South Elgin, Pingree Grove, Gilberts, West Dundee, Hampshire, Elburn, Sleepy Hollow, Wayne, Valley View, Lily Lake, Burlington and Virgil. Including the following interstate... I-90 between mile markers 47 and 56. This includes... Elgin Community College and Kane County Cougars Ballpark. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for north central and northeastern Illinois.
